name: More Than 25 Million Poems about the Midwest
name_original: More Than 25 Million Poems about the Midwest
description:
You will be writing one of 25,660,800 possible poems about the American Midwest.  Simply click on the line of poetry that is most appealing to you.  You will continue to choose lines for a total of six.  At the end, the entire poem will be displayed, along with an appropriate title.  Read the result, then write another poem if you'd like!

Author and programmer:  B.J. Best

Editor:  Alex Crader

Designer:  Kaylen Logan

Soundtrack:  Steev Baker, steevbaker.bandcamp.com

Originally released as an iOS app in 2015.  Supported by Carroll University and Portage Magazine, portagemagazine.org.
